Text: Riots in the streets. Army called in. 40 million unemployed. Over 103,000 dead.Is Trump finished making America Great Again?#TrumpResignNow

@mmpadellan @realDonaldTrump @SecretService Trump is escalating violence. I reported this to twitter. I cannot believe that the good men and women of the secret service are charged with defending such a menace to society.

Trump is the epitome of the terrified white man. One minute he's all, "when the looting starts, the shooting starts," but the second the country responds to that, he's suddenly shouting for his followers to come protect him. There's all this aggression and fear.

A nationwide review conducted by @ABC News has identified at least 54 criminal cases where Trump was invoked in direct connection with violent acts, threats of violence or allegations of assault. https://t.co/S4TKvmKaWi

Democrats slammed President Trump for what they said was inciting violence by protesters in Minneapolis."Trump's tweets yet again show what racism looks like. This is why we need new leadership. Vote," Sen. Kamala Harris tweeted. https://t.co/k7Ek3FRS2Z

Someone should take a look at Trump's goons. I know online the past week Russia has increased their influence around this especially with their regular propagandists spewing crap, trolls and bots, and that media outlet Redfish I warned about earlier in the week
@secupp So, sounds like you want to make this about #Trump, who has only been in office for 3.5 years. Pretty sleazy. https://t.co/SDJX3XDnlO

You ever sometimes think if you ever saw Donald Trump on his phone typing the bullshit tweets he does, to just grab that phone out his hand and give him a good, juicy smack across the face? Confiscated mate. Collect it at the end of the year when you're no longer president.👋🏻

If Trump tries to send Army military police to Minnesota, Congress must stop it before it happens.We have seen enough norms and laws destroyed and ignored under this administration, this cannot come to pass.

Here I am.  I, Abraham Donald Trump, want to honor the HEROES who died here last summer.  There were good people ; bad people on both sides--on BOTH SIDES. Who knows what it was for.  Maybe it was for me. I have the best words so this is a real beauty…
